autoAccept.name: Auto-Accept TPA
autoAccept.description: If enabled, all TPA requests will be accepted automatically.

showOriginalMessage.name: Show Original Message
showOriginalMessage.description: If enabled, the original TPA request message from the server will be displayed in chat. Disable it to keep your chat cleaner.

showPlayerName.name: Show Player Name
showPlayerName.description: Displays the name of the player who sent the TPA request. This should be disabled if you use the 'CustomNameTags' addon to ensure compatibility.

playSound.name: Play Sound
playSound.description: Settings for sound notifications on incoming TPA requests.
